Dr. Carla Reita Faria Leal is a Doctor and MSc in Social Relations Law, sub-area of Labor Law, by Pontifícia Universidade Católica de São Paulo (PUC/SP). Associate professor of the Federal University of Mato Grosso (UFMT), currently teaching, research and extension, integrating academic knowledge and social commitment.

She completed his post-doctorate and was a visiting fellow at the Rights Lab, at the University of Nottingham (United Kingdom).

She is present at academic, legal and inter-institutional events, focusing on topics such as decent work, human rights, public policies and confrontation with slave labor.

She is the Deputy Coordinator of the Direct Graduate Program at UFMT (2023–2025), leading the research group and coordinating the PAI Extension Project – aimed at the qualification and reinsertion of workers discharged from conditions similar to employment.

:::
